notes: In PBR, the user is locked into the selected move until it fully executes either by hitting, missing, or failing. In other words, if the game says it can't be used or there is no target, it will keep trying to use the move.

In PBR, there is an obscure but unconfirmed glitch (which may not necessarily related to this move) where the critical hit multiplier is passed onto the user's next move. If the user uses this move and it is intended to be a critical hit but misses, the user's next move (any damage move) will deal critical damage.
